name: mcp-remote
description: A universal connector that enables AI assistants to connect to any remote Model Context Protocol (MCP) server via mcp-remote
long_description:
This universal MCP connector allows you to connect to any remote Model Context Protocol server using the mcp-remote adapter. Simply provide the URL of your remote MCP server and start using its tools immediately.

Features:

- Connect to any remote MCP server
- Support for OAuth authentication
- SSL/TLS encrypted connections
- No local server installation required
- Works with all MCP-compatible clients
- Easy one-time setup

Compatible with Claude Desktop, Cursor, Windsurf, ChatWise, and any MCP-compatible clients.

server_url.title: Remote MCP Server URL
server_url.description: The complete URL of the remote MCP server (e.g., https://example.com/mcp)

validation.message: Please enter a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL

tools.name: dynamic
tools.description: Tools are dynamically loaded from the connected remote MCP server
